member.name: T:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI
member.summary: Han Zombie Plague API. Han 僵尸瘟疫 API.

member.name: P:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.GameStart
member.summary: Gets whether the game has started. 获取游戏是否已经开始。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_IsZombie(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified player is a zombie. 检查指定玩家是否为丧尸。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_IsMotherZombie(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified player is a mother zombie. 检查指定玩家是否为母体丧尸。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_IsNemesis(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified player is a Nemesis. 检查指定玩家是否为复仇之神（Nemesis）。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_IsAssassin(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified player is an Assassin zombie. 检查指定玩家是否为暗杀者丧尸（Assassin）。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_IsSurvivor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified player is a Survivor. 检查指定玩家是否为幸存者（幸存者职业）。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_IsSniper(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified player is a Sniper. 检查指定玩家是否为狙击手（狙击手职业）。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_IsHero(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified player is a Hero. 检查指定玩家是否为英雄（英雄职业）。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_PlayerHaveScbaSuit(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified player has purchased and owns the SCBA suit (chemical protective suit). 检查指定玩家是否已购买并拥有防化服（SCBA Suit）。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_PlayerHaveGodState(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified player is currently in God Mode (invincibility) purchased state. 检查指定玩家是否处于已购买的无敌状态（God Mode）。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_PlayerHaveInfiniteAmmoState(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified player is currently in Infinite Ammo state purchased. 检查指定玩家是否处于已购买的无限子弹状态。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GetCurrentModeName
member.summary: Gets the name of the current game mode/round type. 获取当前回合的模式名称。 可用于在不同模式下实现自定义逻辑。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetTargetZombie(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Directly turns the target human player into a zombie (non-infection method). 将目标人类玩家直接设置为丧尸（非感染方式）。 可用于实现道具如“T病毒试剂”等非感染转化效果。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetTargetHuman(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Directly turns the target zombie player back into a human. 将目标丧尸玩家直接设置回人类。 （直接转换，非通过感染或解药方式）

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_InfectMotherZombie(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Infects the target human player and turns them into a Mother Zombie. 将目标人类玩家感染并转化为母体丧尸。 感染逻辑与游戏寻找母体丧尸的规则一致。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_InfectPlayer(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Infects the target human player and turns them into a regular zombie. 将目标人类玩家感染并转化为普通丧尸。 感染逻辑与游戏中玩家被感染的规则一致。
member.param: The player to infect.
Whether to ignore the target's SCBA suit (chemical protective suit) protection.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetTargetNemesis(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Directly turns the target human player into a Nemesis zombie. 将目标人类玩家直接设置为复仇之神（Nemesis）。
member.param: The player to set as Nemesis.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetTargetAssassin(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Directly turns the target human player into an Assassin zombie. 将目标人类玩家直接设置为暗杀者丧尸（Assassin）。
member.param: The player to set as Assassin.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetTargetTVaccine(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Administers T-Virus vaccine/serum to the target zombie player, turning them back to human (if possible). 让目标丧尸玩家服用T病毒血清，将其变回人类（特殊丧尸无法改变）。
member.param: The zombie player to administer the vaccine to.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetTargetSniper(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Directly turns the target human player into a Sniper. 将目标人类玩家直接设置为狙击手（Sniper）。
member.param: The player to set as Sniper.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetTargetSurvivor(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Directly turns the target human player into a Survivor. 将目标人类玩家直接设置为幸存者（Survivor）。
member.param: The player to set as Survivor.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetTargetHero(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Directly turns the target human player into a Hero. 将目标人类玩家直接设置为英雄（Hero）。
member.param: The player to set as Hero.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GiveTVirusGrenade(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Gives the specified zombie player a T-Virus Grenade. 给予指定丧尸玩家一枚T病毒炸弹。
member.param: The zombie player to give the grenade to.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GiveScbaSuit(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Gives the specified human player an SCBA suit (chemical protective suit). 给予指定人类玩家一件防化服（SCBA Suit）。
member.param: The human player to give the SCBA suit to.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GiveGodState(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer,System.Single)
member.summary: Grants the specified player God Mode (invincibility) for a custom duration in seconds. 给予指定玩家无敌状态（God Mode），持续自定义的秒数。
member.param: The player to grant God Mode to.
Duration of invincibility in seconds (e.g. 30f for 30 seconds).

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GiveInfiniteAmmo(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer,System.Single)
member.summary: Grants the specified player Infinite Ammo mode for a custom duration in seconds. 给予指定玩家无限子弹状态，持续自定义的秒数。
member.param: The player to grant Infinite Ammo to.
Duration of infinite ammo in seconds.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_HumanAddHealth(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a specified amount of health to the human player (cannot exceed the max health defined for their class/role in config). 为指定人类玩家增加指定数值血量（无法超过配置中该职业/角色的最大血量上限）。
member.param: The human player to add health to.
The amount of health to add (positive integer).

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GetZombieClassname(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Gets the internal classname/string identifier of the current zombie class/type for the player. 获取指定玩家的丧尸职业/类型名称（Classname）。 可用于制作技能组、判断特定丧尸类型等逻辑。
member.param: The zombie player whose class name to retrieve.
member.returns: The zombie class name as a string.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GetZombieMaxHealth(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the maximum health value for the player's current zombie class. 获取指定玩家的丧尸职业最大血量值。
member.param: The zombie player to query.

true → Returns the max health value from the plugin's configuration.
false → Returns the current pawn.MaxHealth value (may be modified in-game).
member.returns: The maximum health value for this zombie class/type.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_CheckRoundWinConditions
member.summary: Immediately checks the round win conditions for both teams. Calls this method to force-check if any win condition is met (e.g., team member count). If a winning condition is satisfied, the round will end immediately. 立即检查当前回合的胜利条件。 调用后会立刻判断双方阵营人数或其他条件是否满足胜利要求， 如果满足任一结束条件，则立即结束回合。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetHumanWin
member.summary: Forces the human team to win the current round immediately. 强制让人类阵营立即获胜（结束当前回合）。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetZombieWin
member.summary: Forces the zombie team to win the current round immediately. 强制让丧尸阵营立即获胜（结束当前回合）。

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetPlayerGlow(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a glowing outline effect on the specified player (visible through walls). The glow is automatically removed when the player dies. Uses RGBA color values (0–255 for each channel). 为指定玩家设置外发光效果（可透视墙体）。 玩家死亡后发光效果会自动移除。 使用 RGBA 值（每个通道 0–255）。
member.param: The player to apply the glow effect to.
Red channel value (0–255).
Green channel value (0–255).
Blue channel value (0–255).
Alpha (opacity) value (0–255, 0 = fully transparent, 255 = fully opaque).

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_RemovePlayerGlow(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Removes the glowing outline effect from the specified player (if any exists). 删除指定玩家的外发光效果（如果存在）。
member.param: The player whose glow effect should be removed.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetPlayerFov(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a custom Field of View (FOV) for the specified player. The FOV will automatically reset to 90 when the player dies. 为指定玩家设置自定义视野范围（FOV）。 玩家死亡后会自动恢复为默认值 90。
member.param: The player to change FOV for.
The desired FOV value (typically between 70–120, depending on game limits).

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GiveFireGrenade(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Gives the specified player a fire/incendiary grenade (burning damage over time). 给予指定玩家一枚燃烧/高爆手雷（造成持续燃烧伤害）。
member.param: The player to receive the fire grenade.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GiveLightGrenade(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Gives the specified player a flashbang / illumination grenade (light effect). 给予指定玩家一枚照明弹（照明效果）。
member.param: The player to receive the light grenade.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GiveFreezeGrenade(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Gives the specified player a Freeze Grenade (freezes targets on explosion). 给予指定玩家一枚冰冻弹（Freeze Grenade，爆炸后可冻结目标）。
member.param: The player to receive the freeze grenade.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GiveTeleportGrenade(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Gives the specified player a Teleport Grenade (allows teleportation on explosion). 给予指定玩家一枚传送手雷（Teleport Grenade，爆炸后可实现传送效果）。
member.param: The player to receive the teleport grenade.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GiveIncGrenade(SwiftlyS2.Shared.Players.IPlayer)
member.summary: Gives the specified player an Incendiary Grenade (causes burning/fire damage over time). 给予指定玩家一枚火焰弹/燃烧弹（Incendiary Grenade，造成持续火焰/燃烧伤害）。
member.param: The player to receive the incendiary grenade.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_SetExternalPreference(System.UInt64,System.String)
member.summary: Externally sets the player's preferred zombie class (for database persistence). Used by external systems/plugins to save player preferences to their own database, then sync the value to the plugin's internal dictionary. If className is null or empty string, it means "random" preference. 外部设置玩家的丧尸职业偏好（用于数据库持久化保存）。 供外部插件/系统调用，将玩家偏好保存到自己的数据库后， 再同步到本插件内部的字典中。 如果 className 为 null 或空字符串，则代表“随机”偏好。
member.param: The player's SteamID64.
The preferred zombie class name, or null/empty for random.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GetZombieNameBySteamid(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Retrieves the player's pre-set zombie class name based on SteamID (for external plugins). 根据 SteamID 获取玩家预设的丧尸职业名称（供外部插件调用）。
member.param: The player's SteamID64.

member.name: M:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_GetZombieProperties(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a snapshot of all core properties for the specified zombie class/type by name. 根据丧尸职业名称获取该职业的所有核心属性快照（当前配置值）。
member.param: The internal name of the zombie class/type.
member.returns: A ZombiePropertySnapshot containing the core properties, or null if the class does not exist. 返回包含核心属性的快照对象；若该职业名称不存在，则返回 null。

member.name: E:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_OnGameStart
member.summary: Event triggered when the game round officially starts or ends. 游戏回合正式开始或结束时触发的事件。
member.remarks:
The bool parameter indicates the game start state:
true → Game/round has started
false → Game/round has ended

member.name: E:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_OnPlayerInfect
member.summary:
广播玩家被感染事件（玩家转化为丧尸时触发）。
Broadcasts the player infection event (triggered when a player turns into a zombie).
参数顺序 / Parameter order:
1. IPlayer? 感染者（attacker，可能为 null，如果没有明确感染来源）
IPlayer? Infector (attacker, may be null if no clear infection source)
2. IPlayer 被感染者（victim，被转化为丧尸的玩家）
IPlayer Infected player (victim, the player becoming a zombie)
3. bool 是否由手雷/爆炸物感染（true = 手雷感染，false = 普通感染）
bool Whether caused by grenade/explosive (true = grenade infection, false = normal infection)
4. string 被感染后转化为的丧尸职业名称（zombie class name）
string Zombie class name the infected player is turned into (zombie class name)

member.name: E:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_OnMotherZombieSelected
member.summary:
广播母体丧尸被选择事件（回合开始时母体丧尸确定）。
Broadcasts the Mother Zombie selection event (when Mother Zombie is chosen at round start).
参数 / Parameter:
IPlayer 母体丧尸玩家（被选为母体丧尸的玩家对象）
IPlayer Mother Zombie player (the player selected as Mother Zombie)

member.name: E:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_OnNemesisSelected
member.summary:
广播复仇之神被选择事件（回合开始时 Nemesis 确定）。
Broadcasts the Nemesis selection event (when Nemesis is chosen at round start).
参数 / Parameter:
IPlayer 复仇之神玩家（被选为 Nemesis 的玩家对象）
IPlayer Nemesis player (the player selected as Nemesis)

member.name: E:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_OnAssassinSelected
member.summary:
广播暗杀者被选择事件（回合开始时 Assassin 确定）。
Broadcasts the Assassin selection event (when Assassin is chosen at round start).
参数 / Parameter:
IPlayer 暗杀者玩家（被选为 Assassin 的玩家对象）
IPlayer Assassin player (the player selected as Assassin)

member.name: E:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_OnHeroSelected
member.summary:
广播英雄被选择事件（回合开始时 Hero 确定）。
Broadcasts the Hero selection event (when Hero is chosen at round start).
参数 / Parameter:
IPlayer 英雄玩家（被选为 Hero 的玩家对象）
IPlayer Hero player (the player selected as Hero)

member.name: E:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_OnSurvivorSelected
member.summary:
广播幸存者被选择事件（回合开始时 Survivor 确定）。
Broadcasts the Survivor selection event (when Survivor is chosen at round start).
参数 / Parameter:
IPlayer 幸存者玩家（被选为 Survivor 的玩家对象）
IPlayer Survivor player (the player selected as Survivor)

member.name: E:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_OnSniperSelected
member.summary:
广播狙击手被选择事件（回合开始时 Sniper 确定）。
Broadcasts the Sniper selection event (when Sniper is chosen at round start).
参数 / Parameter:
IPlayer 狙击手玩家（被选为 Sniper 的玩家对象）
IPlayer Sniper player (the player selected as Sniper)

member.name: E:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_OnHumanWin
member.summary:
广播人类阵营胜利事件（回合结束时宣布胜利阵营）。
Broadcasts the human team victory event (triggered at round end when declaring the winner).
参数 / Parameter:
bool true = 人类胜利 / Humans win
false = 丧尸胜利 / Zombies win

member.name: E:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_OnGameModeSelect
member.summary:
广播当前游戏模式/回合类型被选择事件。
Broadcasts the game mode / round type selection event.
参数 / Parameter:
string 配置中的模式名称（当前选中的游戏模式名称，可用于自定义模式逻辑）
string Game mode name from configuration (the selected mode name, can be used for custom mode logic)

member.name: E:HanZombiePlagueS2.IHanZombiePlagueAPI.HZP_OnPreferenceChanged
member.summary:
当玩家通过菜单更改丧尸职业偏好后广播的事件。
Broadcasts the event when a player changes their zombie class preference via menu.
外部插件可监听此事件来将玩家的偏好保存到数据库。
External plugins can listen to this event to save the player's preference to database.
参数 / Parameters:
1. ulong steamid - 更改偏好的玩家的 SteamID64
ulong steamid - SteamID64 of the player who changed preference
2. string? 丧尸名字 - 新选择的丧尸职业名称；null 或空字符串表示“随机”
string? Zombie class name - New preferred zombie class name; null or empty string means "random"

member.name: T:HanZombiePlagueS2.ZombiePropertySnapshot
member.summary: 丧尸职业的核心属性快照（从配置中读取的原始值快照）。 Snapshot of core properties for a zombie class/type (original values read from configuration).

member.name: P:HanZombiePlagueS2.ZombiePropertySnapshot.Name
member.summary: 丧尸职业名称（内部唯一标识）。 Zombie class name (internal unique identifier).

member.name: P:HanZombiePlagueS2.ZombiePropertySnapshot.Health
member.summary: 普通状态下的最大血量。 Maximum health in normal zombie state.

member.name: P:HanZombiePlagueS2.ZombiePropertySnapshot.MotherHealth
member.summary: 作为母体丧尸（Mother Zombie）时的最大血量。 Maximum health when this zombie is selected as Mother Zombie.

member.name: P:HanZombiePlagueS2.ZombiePropertySnapshot.Speed
member.summary: 移动速度（通常为 1.0f 为默认人类速度，丧尸可能更高）。 Movement speed (1.0f is typically default human speed; zombies may have higher values).

member.name: P:HanZombiePlagueS2.ZombiePropertySnapshot.Damage
member.summary: 伤害加成。 Damage multiplier.

member.name: P:HanZombiePlagueS2.ZombiePropertySnapshot.Gravity
member.summary: 重力缩放值（影响跳跃高度、掉落速度等，越小跳得越高）。 Gravity scale .

member.name: P:HanZombiePlagueS2.ZombiePropertySnapshot.EnableRegen
member.summary: 是否启用自动回血功能。 Whether automatic health regeneration is enabled.

member.name: P:HanZombiePlagueS2.ZombiePropertySnapshot.HpRegenSec
member.summary: 自动回血的间隔时间（秒）。 Interval time between each health regeneration tick (in seconds).

member.name: P:HanZombiePlagueS2.ZombiePropertySnapshot.HpRegenHp
member.summary: 每次自动回血恢复的血量值。 Amount of health restored per regeneration tick.

member.name: P:HanZombiePlagueS2.ZombiePropertySnapshot.ModelPath
member.summary: 该丧尸职业使用的模型路径（游戏中显示的外观模型）。 Model path used for this zombie class (the visual model in-game).
